General.Name: Shanghai Titan Scientific Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Shanghai Titan Scientific Co., Ltd. provides laboratory products and supporting services for scientific researchers and quality control personnel. It offers a range of services for laboratories in the fields of biomedicine, new materials, new energy, chemical chemistry, fine chemicals, food daily chemicals, analysis, and testing through independent research and development, brand operation, brand agency, integrated packaging services, etc. Shanghai Titan Scientific Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
